eWallHost: Unlimited Bandwidth Shared Hosting in the Netherlands for $3.02/mo!

directadmin, ewalhost, netherlands, shared March 17, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

eWallHost is debuting on LowEndBox with a DirectAdmin shared offer in the Netherlands for our readers.

  • 5GB disk, 5 domains, unlimited bandwidth: $3.02 per month with no annual commitment!

These come with a 30-day money-back guarantee, a four-nines (99.99%) uptime guarantee, and free technical support in English, Tamil, or Hindi.

Their WHOIS is public. They are registered in India (102822). Their Terms of Service is available on their web site. They accept CCAvenue, Paypal, PayUmoney, and Bitcoin.

Here’s a little about eWallHost in their own words:

Hosting and domain providing are our twin-engines. At eWallHost, we strive to keep the operations running while innovating new solutions in our workspace. Innovations are directed towards cost reduction and user-friendly features. Any doubts, questions, or discontent you have about our services or products, you can ask us anytime. Reach us out to understand in detail about domain registration. We provide support, all day all week. On top of all that, we offer the best price in business with no hidden agendas. Transparency is the key thing we had in our mind when we laid the cornerstone for our organization back in 2007. Our employees go far ends to make your dreams possible. Whatever it may be. From dedicated servers to VPS, we got it all covered.

Remember that the LEB community would love to hear about your experience in the comments section below!

Now read more to see the offers!
